li.label: Fur
li.description: People aren't supposed to have fur.

li.label: Fur
li.description: So soft, so warm...

li.label: Fur
li.description: I'm too hot like this, and I don't like how animal it makes me look!

li.label: Wings
li.description: How am I supposed to use these things?

li.label: Wings
li.description: Okay sure, they might not be practical for lifting things, or flying, or really anything I guess; but they do allow me to do an even better imitation of a dodo!

li.label: Wings
li.description: How am I supposed to do anything with wings? They don't even let me fly!

li.label: Hooves
li.description: Not hooves, what am I meant to do with these?!

li.label: Hooves
li.description: Hm. Well, I can't say it was unexpected...

li.label: Hooves
li.description: MY HANDS! Please, no!

li.label: Hooves
li.description: One step closer to all fours. This is great!

li.label: Animal legs
li.description: Are they bent a different way, or is that my heel?

li.label: Animal legs
li.description: I can be so much faster like this! Once I get used to it.

li.label: Animal legs
li.description: My knee's bending backwards now! What? That's my heel, not my knee? Even worse!

li.label: Animal legs
li.description: Just a bit further, and I won't be able to stand up! How about that?

li.label: Paws for feet
li.description: Well, at least I won't have a problem walking over gravel.

li.label: Paws for feet
li.description: Look at my cute little paws!

li.label: Paws for feet
li.description: Wait, whats happened to my feet? They look like a beasts!

li.label: Avian claw-feet
li.description: It's a bit wierd walking around on chicken-feet.

li.label: Avian claw-feet
li.description: I am suprised just how nimble these avian claws are, I haven't missed a step!

li.label: Avian claw-feet
li.description: My feet look like a chickens. I wonder if I'm starting to taste like one too?

li.label: Hooves
li.description: Well, at least I don't need shoes anymore.

li.label: Hooves
li.description: No more shoes! Awesome!

li.label: Hooves
li.description: I can't even sneak away from the humiliation anymore... these things cause a racket wherever I go!

li.label: Wool
li.description: Everything is so itchy!

li.label: Wool
li.description: It's so soft and warm.

li.label: Wool
li.description: I really need a shave.

li.label: Heavy fur
li.description: It's pretty stuffy under here.

li.label: Heavy fur
li.description: A thick pelt, for soft hugs.

li.label: Heavy fur
li.description: It's unbearably hot under this hideous pelt!

li.label: Ear holes
li.description: What the, where are my ears?

li.label: Ear holes
li.description: I suppose they're more streamlined now?

li.label: Ear holes
li.description: My ears?! This is a nightmare! I look like a monster!

li.label: ...eggs?!
li.description: How is this even possible? It feels so weird...

li.label: ...eggs?!
li.description: This is taking it too far. People weren't meant to lay eggs!

li.label: ...eggs?!
li.description: How!? Why!? What has become of me!?

li.label: ...eggs?!
li.description: I know I wanted this, but I'm not entirely sure now.
